title: 2.3 Master Challenge 2
question: You baked 300 each of vanilla and chocolate cookies. You were able to sell 143 vanilla and 250 chocolate cookies in all. Find out the percentage of vanilla, chocolate and the total number of cookies sold. Write an algorithm, flowchart and Python code for it.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
